content.prompt: Complete the following program in order to print to the console the last character of a string entered by a user from the keyboard. Assume that the string entered by the user is at least 1-character long.Important: Note that you have to define a variable named lastChar to store the last character of the user input, which is printed to the console in the last part of the code below.
